body_html: Would it perhaps make sense to add an atomic_add=False option to index_select? I do agree that it seems nice to note in the docs that the spec is that the default behavior for overlapping index_select is undefined.
body_text: Would it perhaps make sense to add an atomic_add=False option to index_select? I do agree that it seems nice to note in the docs that the spec is that the default behavior for overlapping index_select is undefined.
body: Would it perhaps make sense to add an `atomic_add=False` option to index_select? I do agree that it seems nice to note in the docs that the spec is that the default behavior for overlapping index_select is undefined.
